name: Contagious (CluelessStudio)
description:
The world has come to an end. Cities are devastated, and most of the population is lurking around but they are no longer alive.

You are a soldier trying to survive in a zombie apocalypse, due to an unspected outbreak your unit was forced to leave without you. Items are limited, be sure to kill the zombies and loot any powerup that may help you out, run through the alleys of this forsaken city and find you way out.

Controls:

WASD - move the player

R - Reload

Right mouse click - Shoot

I - Inventory

Esc - Pause Menu
